overview: Before joining WebTech Wireless, Andrew Morden served as the CFO at Vancouver-based Intrinsyc Software and Digital Dispatch Systems. He was previously employed at the Internet Marketing Center, first as CFO and then as acting CEO in preparation for the ultimately successful sale of that business. Earlier in his career, Andrew served as the Vice President of Financial Planning and Systems and as a Director of ERP Systems at Intrawest Corporation, and as an ERP Client and Project Manager at SAP Canada. He qualified as a chartered accountant with KPMG working in their Vancouver and Sydney, Australia offices before leaving as a Senior Manager. Andrew is a graduate of the UBC Commerce program, an avid athlete and a former member of the Canadian National Rowing Team.
